TitleEnglish: City Hunter The Movie: Angel Dust
SummaryEnglish: Ryo Saeba, a.k.a. City Hunter. A sweeper who fulfills all his client's needs. He'll do anything from bodyguarding to contract killing, but he'll only take the job if a pretty woman is involved, or the client's sincerity makes his heart tremble. Together with his partner Kaori Makimura, the kid sister of his late best friend, Ryo fights the evil haunting the shadows of the city!!
Aliases: Gekijо̄ban City Hunter: Tenshi no Namida
Gekijоuban City Hunter: Tenshi no Namida
